biography: Peyton Lindsey Romero was born in a small farming community in South Louisiana. On the family farm they grew rice, soy beans, and raised live stock in addition to caring for a variety of orphaned wild animals, waterfowl and their offspring. At Louisiana State University Peyton majored in Agro Business and Construction. While at LSU he began modeling sparking a career that spanned a decade. He then further broadened his entertainment experience at Disney World and Universal Studios. Acting was the profession Peyton desired. He has performed in many roles for film and TV. Among these are Sea Quest, Out of The Blue, Immorality, Jayden's Journey, Samantha, Fired, The Adventures of Big Foot, The Brawler and Our Father's Keeper. Additionally, he was involved in Blood & Oil and Yellowstone. In season, Peyton serves as a wildland firefighter. Some of his other passions are stunt driving, music, and any sport that involves the outdoors.
name: Peyton Romero
